title: European Renaissance: Art, science, literature
description: Dive into Europe's 'rebirth', marked by unparalleled artistic, scientific, and literary advancements that shaped the modern world.

title: Age of Exploration: Columbus, Magellan, Vasco da Gama
description: Join the daring voyages that connected the globe, bringing cultures into contact, and transforming history forever.

title: Mesoamerica: Aztecs, Mayans
description: Delve into the intricate civilizations of Mesoamerica, their vast knowledge, monumental pyramids, and eventual encounters with Europe.

title: Andean Civilization: Inca
description: Ascend the Andes to explore the last great pre-Columbian empire, known for its vast road networks, masonry, and mountain citadels.
